name: set-login-build-task
author: Google Cloud Tools
description: Save to a variable the login password for a Google Compute Engine virtual machine running windows.

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: GCP connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Google Cloud Platform connection to use.

inputs.name: zone
inputs.label: Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown: The zone of the virtual machine to get a new password for.

inputs.name: machine
inputs.label: Virtual Machine
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the virtual machine to get a new password for.

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name to create or reset the password of.

inputs.name: passwordOutput
inputs.label: Password Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build variable to store the new password in.

inputs.name: machineIpOutput
inputs.label: VM IP Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the build variable to store the machine ip in.
